channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:48 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:48 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 00:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Go to shelter!

item.title: 🟡 20:52 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
